text: Jindřich Panský (born 29 July 1960) is a male former Czech international table tennis player. He won two silver medals at the 1985 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Milan Orlowski and in the mixed doubles with Marie Hrachová. He also competed in the men's singles event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists Category:Czech male table tennis players Category:Olympic table tennis players of Czechoslovakia Category:Table tennis players at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Plzeň
title: Jindřich Panský
